recent_publications.title: A Novel Approach to Pediatric Airway Reconstruction: A Case Series
recent_publications.abstract: This study presents a novel surgical technique for complex pediatric airway reconstruction, demonstrating improved outcomes and reduced complication rates in a series of 5 patients.

recent_publications.title: Comparison of Cochlear Implant Efficacy in Pre-Versus Postsynaptic Auditory Neuropathy: A Systematic Review
recent_publications.abstract: A systematic review comparing the effectiveness of cochlear implantation in children with pre- and postsynaptic auditory neuropathy spectrum disorder, finding significant differences in speech perception outcomes.

recent_publications.title: Nasal Dermoid Cyst with Sinus Tract Intranasal Bone: A Case Report
recent_publications.citation: International Journal of Otolaryngology and Head & Neck Surgery 13 (NO.2), 2024
recent_publications.abstract: A detailed case report of a rare presentation of nasal dermoid cyst extending into the intranasal bone, highlighting diagnostic challenges and surgical management strategies.

recent_publications.title: Association of fine-needle aspiration of thyroid nodules with final histopathology in diagnosing thyroid malignancy: a single institute retrospective study
recent_publications.abstract: Retrospective study evaluating the accuracy of fine-needle aspiration cytology in diagnosing thyroid malignancy compared to final histopathology results at a single medical center.
